Rulings.Base:
1. The first effect targets the Dragon-Type 'Dragunity' monster in your GY.
2. The second effect targets your opponent's face-up monster.
3. Sending 1 'Dragunity' card to the GY is a cost to use the second effect.
4. If this card's effect is negated while it is equipped with a 'Dragunity' monster, the 'Dragunity' monster will be destroyed and sent to the GY.

PSCT.Base: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Level 3 or lower Dragon "Dragunity" monster in your GY; equip that target to this card. You can send 1 "Dragunity" card from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.
